SHIFTY.raw_line: Fucking hell, man...You're early!Yes, rude boy.I'm sweet... come in, man, come in.Good to see you too, geezer.You alright son?Have you slept?Mate, neither have I... I just got back from some girls yard.No, no... just some fucking booty call.In case of emergency's, man... you know it.What!Yeah, she's alright you know.... She's got fucking massive Gary's.You know that!Mate, do you mind halal?Were you on just one bus?LUTON!Fucking random.I've got a few things to do today geezer, you can stay here if you want, just chill out.Or you can come with me?Mate, he doesn't eat vegetables.Apart from in a pot noodle.Shut up you prick.Soak it in fat boy.Yeah, fucking laugh it up.Four years.I pay you fucking rent don't I?Jokes.What have you got, rent or mortgage?Yeah, mature, man.Rez, man...Leave him alone.I invited him to a party.Rachel Price.Mate, Rachel and Serena.You remember Rachel, you fucking lunged her at Jazzbo Browns?Her ponytail swept the floor.I wouldn't mind if he did it discreetly, but he lunged her from about three feet.You can come along if you want.Fuck off.Trevor.Yeah I know, mate?Trevor, what do you want?Mate, you haven't... you haven't paid me for last week yet?Mate, keep your voice down.Meet me at the top of the road by the telephone box.Trevor...Don't ever fucking come to my house again.Nothing, geezer wanted to talk to me about a job.Labouring.I'd think about it.What!What?Do me a favour.I'm going to this fucking party.Nine.For fucks sake.Actually, let's go out the back way, it'll be quicker.No....Do you know they've ignored me for about a year......my mum puts the phone down when she hears my voice...My dad crosses the road if he sees me in the street, then they fucking summon me for a fucking job interview.They just want me to meet some up- his-arse-paki who'll look at me like some lost fucking cause!Am I fuck.Dowdy!No, I haven't, no.Yeah, just a small one.Give it a fucking rest geezer.Chill out, he's an old mate of mine.Yeah.Alright mate.What?What? Magnus never wants me to call him.Where's the gear?Alright Lenny?You alright Loretta.Come!Mate, are you alright?What's the matter, what did he say?Yeah.Yeah, I remember.Loves a wrong'un.Apparently... Glen... I think... injected her with some fucking cocktail... I dunno... smack, I think... he passed out first... she passed out... but apparently she was lying up against a radiator... the fucking thing came on full whack. She was so out of it, she didn't even know it was on.......the paramedics had to peel her off.What?SHIIIIIIIIT!Fucking cat lovers.Wait until you see this...C'mon Val.Sorry about this geez.I didn't wanna drag you around all day.Valerie, this is Chris, he's erm, he's an old friend of mine, we grew up together. He's cool. We go way back. So it's cool, you know.I called yesterday but you were out.I dunno, It was probably about two in the afternoon.You must have been asleep.I dunno then.Yeah.It may have been.Yeah, that'll be sweet.How you been, alright.Yeah, I'm alright.She visited you yet?She'll come back one day.Look Val we're gonna have to do one...Geezer, give me a minute.Alright mate?What's your name?Where do you get your weed from?Where d'you get your fucking weed from rude boy?No, you don't.From now on you get your weed from me...At half the price.I'm gonna sell you your weed half price, and your gonna keep this noise down.Yeah?YEAH?Because if I hear one word of complaint from next door, just one single complaint, I'll come back here and I'll take your TV, I'll take your stereo, and I'll shove em up your birds arse.Do you understand me?DO YOU UNDERSTAND ME?Call me if you need any more weed.You know it.What d'you mean?About 70.She's been doing drugs longer than we've been alive.Knocking out what?I dunno, about...three, three and a half years ago.Why when d'you stop knocking out pills.No.Have you?Do you wanna try it?I have to charge you wholesale, you know. I got family in Pakistan, they need ticket for plane travel, man.What?No, I didn't.I thought it'd be a surprise.Mate, it's gonna be fine.I dunno, lot of her new mates, I don't know many of them.No.I thought you worked in recruitment.When do you become a fucking family liaison?I'll be stuck in some fucking warehouse... looking after twenty Bengalis... knocking out dodgy Fruit of the Looms.... I know exactly who they want me to meet, man.I've got a sweet little earner.Only if you get caught, mate.Malik?What's going on?Malik, this is an old mate of mine, Chris.Where are you going, man why you running?No.What, Craig, small Craig.Yeah, go on.What... are you on your way there now?Follow me.This is bollocks.I can't just fuck off.Yeah, but I wouldn't mate... I don't want to... I'm perfectly fucking happy where I am...If Manchester's so full of gal, how come you haven't got a bird yet?Mate, that was four years ago.Yeah of course I did.About what?Yeah.People were saying a lot of shit about both of us.Just... fucking...just rumors, mate, bullshit.Everyone did.I don't know mate. Whatever they were saying about you they were saying about me.You fucking know that... back to mine... bit of munch... couple of Uri Geller's...Yeah, of course I amFuck that.You always kick off.Mate, last time you drank a bottle of whisky you pissed on my leg.In a club.In front of the bouncer.I gotta do one last drop off and we can chill out.How many do you want?How about four!What's work saying?Blair works at St. Marks.He's head caretaker.Yeah it's good, mate, thriving.Yeah but I'm a Muslim drug dealer...Ha Dee fucking Ha... wankers.What?Always.Rez, it's ShiftyWhere are you?You alright mate... you sound a bit down?Is that still job thing still on?Alright mate, I was just asking.Oh shit!I've been busy, mate. You alright?There's nothing left Trev, that's why I haven't answered?Mate, call me in an hour and I`ll sort you out.Mate, I'm in a rush, I'll call you later.Take it easy rude boy. Just chill out.I've had a long fucking day, Trevor, just leave me alone.Just leave it, Chris. Trevor, think about what you're doing, man.Trevor, you need to calm down.Oh shit.Get off me, man.It's a bit fucking late now.Yeah exactly mate. Help might have been fucking nice, do you know what I mean?You're supposed to fucking help me, man, fucking do something.I'm surprised you didn't do a fucking runner?I'm surprised you didn't fucking... run off and leave me to sort out the mess.Why, why, cos I'm speaking the truth. Talking about the past, talking about Serena. Oh no you can't talk about that, you mustn't talk about Serena.Let's fucking talk about it. Let's talk about how you left two weeks after she died without saying goodbye to me, everyone fucking asking me what's going on, every one saying shit about you, bad mouthing you, let me tell you about the fights I had sticking up for you, the broken nose I got when some meathead slagged you off, let's fucking talk about that, mate.I'll tell you where it's fucking got me mate. It's got me earning four thousand a week...How much do you earn in your little cubicle up in Manchester...go on how much do you fucking earn... you probably don't even earn two grand a fucking month you prick...How would I you prick I haven't seen you for four years.No FUCK YOU!REZ...... Why... that's not true... Magnus... Magnus it wasn't... come on, man... I know but... I know... what the fuck was I supposed to do... you know I don't... Magnus, chill out, man... Yeah... yeah... I'm... fucking... WHAT! I'm not in on anything with Glen...whatever your problem is with him that's nothing to do with me... Why you even use that prick... I... what...when... I do know who it was... yeah, Trevor Palmer... you don't know him... yeah... you don't know him... but I... yeah... I will, I will, look man, I didn't kno... I will... CLICK! FUUUCK!!!FUCK! FUCK! FUCK! FUCK!Rez, I'm sorry, man.I ran out of juice.I need it Rez, where is it?Rez, Rez, man.Rez, Rez, Rez...Rez, Rez, I need that bag...Rez, if you don't give it to me I'm a dead man.Fuck, fuck, fuck, fuck, fuck, fuck...REZ, NO!REZ!What the fuck have you done, what the FUCK have you done?Rez.CHRIS!Yeah, I'm alright. You alright.Look man, I'm not gonna do this party...I've got too much shit to deal with.You don't have to come with me. It's up to you?Fucking hell, man. I thought you were gonna leave me cold.There's only so much one man can take.Now you start throwing punches.Loretta, is Glen there?Alright mate.I need to talk to you about something.Can we do it inside.Mate, I'll only be a minute.Something happened today... something, I dunno, something serious... so I phoned Magnus... talked to him about it... told him what happened...Who told you that?And what did he say?Yeah well he went mental, saying some other shit about me cutting it up, mixing the coke, he was saying all sorts of... bullshit...Why would he be saying that... who's been talking to him?Perhaps you should phone him up now, here, in front of me, tell him it's all bollocks.Go on mate, call him up, tell him that I don't cut up the coke.What are you talking about you prick?What the FUCK are you going about.You've been chopping up the fucking gear all along. Selling half of it to the fucking Turks, cutting out Magnus.Fuck you.I didn't think of it, cos I'm not that fucking stupid.Don't worry about it, I'm fucking leaving.Fuck off Glen.Mate, just leave it the geezers a wanker.To mine.Chris I can't. I'm not leaving... I'm not leaving my brother.If they did you'd be in prison mate?Running off didn't help.We were all pretty fucked Chris.Chris if it wasn't you, she would have got it from someone else mate.Sit down.Chris sit down, man.Don't know.I'm out.We've been chased by the police...And my brother flushed my gear down the toilet...Party was blinding though weren't it?What?Fuck you.I didn't think of it, cos I'm not that fucking stupid.
